### Build a library
```{R}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

```

### Set working directory
```{R}
repo <- "~/repos/ak-energy-statistics-2011_2021/"
setwd(repo)

```

## Load from Staging
```{R}
table_2.5a_2019 <- read.csv(file = "./2019/staging/table_2.5a.csv")



```


# add year to table_2.5
```{R}
table_2.5a_2019 <- table_2.5a_2019 %>%
  mutate(Year = "2019", .before = "AEA.Sales.Reporting.ID")


```
